sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SERAPH, or Seraphim, a ſpirit of the higheſt rank in the hierarchy of angels ; who are thus called from their being ſuppoſed to be moſt inflamed with divine love, by their nearer and more immediate attendance at the throne of God, and to communicate then fervour to the remoter and inferior orders. See ANGel.
